alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Harnett; Hoke; Johnston; Sampson; Scotland; Wayne (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 13 at 3:39PM EDT until March 14 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM EDT TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, temperatures around 32. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures in the upper 20s to around 30. * WHERE...Johnston, Harnett, Wayne, Scotland, Hoke, Cumberland and Sampson Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 9 AM EDT Tuesday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Cumberland; Harnett; Hoke; Johnston; Sampson; Scotland; Wayne
